H1.text: who won la liga in the last 10 years. Atletico Madrid

H2.text: who won la liga in the last 10 years. Valencia

H3.text: who won la liga in the last 10 years. Barcelona

A4.text: Barcelona won their eighth double, for seven La Liga titles in ten years.

A5.text: Real Madrid brought back the La Liga title under the management of Zinedine Zidane in 2016–17.

A6.text: Atlético Madrid won La Liga in the 2020–21 season, securing the title with a 2–1 win against Valladolid on 22 May 2021.
